name: Bubble Blitz Frenzy
description:
A new take on a classic, Bubble Blitz Frenzy aims to bring a competitive aspect to the genre!

Play versus real players from around the globe using the Skillz platform.

Pop your way to the top of the leaderbords, earn trophies, and even play for real prizes!

Features:
- Easy to learn yet deep strategy will keep you playing for hours.
- Quick 1-2 minute battles vs. real players.
- A highly polished game experience like nothing seen before
- Play for free indefinitely without ads
- Got Skillz? Play to earn real prizes!

Strategy:
- Explode bombs to unlock your special shot. Shoot it as high as possible to clear massive amounts of bubbles!
- Use chain reactions to unlock Blitz mode where your scores can really shoot up!
- Time power-up and combo shots wisely to coincide with Blitz mode.

Note: Skill-based real prize competitions are not available in all countries and states. If you have any questions about the Skillz system or tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com

This app may include advertising tailored to your interests on behalf of the Sony Corporation family of companies, as well as third parties. To learn more about this, visit www.aboutads.info
